title: VARUS SWIFTBOLT SKIN GLITCH.
body: When testing out the new skin along with the new champion,I noticed whenever Varus Auto attacks things wither it being the new champions tentacles or Minions,Varus' skin texture would change.I'm 100% sure it isn't suppose to happen like this lol..

replies.body: I wasn't aware. Which is why I said possibly.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hiya! 

Thanks so much for the report! 

This is absolutely a bug. There's a texture change for his passive, but it's not being applied properly when the passive activates after killing a minion. We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it. ^-^ 

In the future, please report issues occurring on the PBE on the [PBE Report a Bug](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create) section. It helps us better keep track of issues occurring on PBE bersus live. 

Thanks again!
I knew it looked weird, No problem ^~^ I'll keep searching for bugs :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
